entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Null Argument Exception for at Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellToolbarTracker.OnToolbarPropertyChanged(Object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e) #16686
  • Referencing a Maui Library in a Maui App causes Apt2144 on Android build. on 7.0.400 SDK #16680
  • CORS policy: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' - triggering application crash #16677
  • [UITests] Add features for running tests in better isolation and for handling Multiple Test Cases #16675
    Backlog
  • Improve feedback from UI Tests when failing to navigate to next test #16674
    Backlog
  • Error NETSDK1032: The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'osx-arm64' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible. #16673
  • Problem doing a data binding in GraphicView #16671
  • Random empty rows on ListView #16669
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Border clips on the bottom and right #16667
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.92] DatePicker Initial Binding/Rendering Not Working #16664
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui MenuFlyOut Crashes #16663
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove maximize button finished with close button on the right instead of false #16662
  • CS1061 error in VS for Mac when referencing XAML views in code-behind #16659
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout and Columns Grid #16658
  • Empty MAUI project does not compile: dotnet workload install and restore for android workload fail in microsoft.android.sdk.windows.msi.x64::33.0.80 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json #16657
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Placeholder text issues MacCatalyst & iOS #16656
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Unable to Locate .NET MAUI in VS #16590
  • [regession/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] MAUI Blazor Hybrid rerenders whole layout after each navigation #16661
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) -System.IO.IOException: #16679
  • Button properties are inconsistent when applying android themes #14404
    .NET 8 GA
  • After update, Visual Studio 2022 Preview from 17.7. Preview 6 to 17.8.0 Preview 1 OnClick stopped working - MAUI Blazor #16684
  • Publish replaces "net6.0" tag in Class library with "net6.0-windows10.0.19041" #16649
  • Don't use System.Threading.Timer for MAUI app. #16672
  • Provide API to retrieve the closest MAUI Element to a PlatformView #16330
    .NET 8 GA
  • SwipeView does not work on Android #14805
    Under Consideration
  • Swipe not working when SwipeView is used as base element #6154
    Under Consideration
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Voiceover: Voice over is not announcing the "Review" label for slider, Minus, Plus buttons. #15595
    .NET 8 GA
  • Net 7 and net 8 preview 1 side by side I get Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #16626
  • new MAUI App project, Nuget dependencies are not being restored #16615
  • https://github.com/gorkhadk/maui_crash_reproduction #16630
  • The Tick event trigger continuously on Android #10257
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Use the correct WASDK property #16683
    area/single project ☝️, backport/suggested
  • Don't force the RID to be x64 #16678
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [net7.0] Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16641
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix the case where silent was requested #16676
    area/Xaml </>
  • Update CODEOWNERS #16682
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • Add doc comments for common types used in templates, maps, webview #16552
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, .NET 8 GA
  • Add swipe gesture for uitests #16560
  • [build] Bump XCode to 14.3.1 #16374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in DatePicker #16589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SwipeItem #16614
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.100-rc.1.23404.2 #16644
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fix signing #16660
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16655
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Resize internal content container when ScrollView content is resized #16651
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16634
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Remove checkboxes from bug template #16650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
    area/dispatching

Updated

  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
    Under Consideration
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/theme, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, Under Consideration
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • Re-land "[Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing" #16637
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Use same type converter for Brush as for Color to enable XAML completion #16639
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Correctly propagate the BindingContext to SwipeView Content #16632
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    community ✨, layout-scrollview
